mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.tag_name tagName, b.user_name createName, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, a.state, a.order_by orderBy FROM forum_tag a, sys_eve_user_staff b WHERE a.create_id = b.user_id
AND a.tag_name LIKE '%${tagName}%'
AND a.state != 4 ORDER BY a.order_by ASC

SELECT a.id FROM forum_tag a WHERE a.tag_name = #{tagName} AND a.state != 4
AND a.id != #{id}
